Hello,

I would like to have a crawl job that won't end when there is nothing
more to crawl, but just sit there and wait for any JMX injected URIs.
Somethink like the AdaptiveRevitsFrontier, but with a BdbFrontier (so,
I can use JMX). Any clue how to do it?

Thanks,
